name: Pulsating Witch
description:
After you switch to Lisa, who has this card equipped: Attach Conductive to the opposing active character. (Once per Round)
(You must have Lisa in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw: After you switch to <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1409]</color>, who has this card equipped: Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114091]</color> to the opposing active character. (Once per Round)\n(You must have $[A1409] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced: After you switch to <color=#FFFFFFFF>Lisa</color>, who has this card equipped: Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>Conductive</color> to the opposing active character. (Once per Round)\n(You must have Lisa in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: As a Librarian who has read through tens of thousands of volumes, of course it's trivial for me to remember how to win...
source: Reward for inviting Lisa to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
